Legislative History of Laws

For D.C. Law 13-293, see notes following § 16-4501.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 16 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction Act. See Volume 9, Part IA Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE § 16-4516

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Registry of out-of-state custody decrees and proceedings.    [Repealed]
